sentences.english: The random mid-point displacement method is an important method in the FBM.

sentences.english: At the same time, astronomers can look for the spacetime analogues of random Brownian motion.
sentences.chinese: 同時，天文學家可以尋找時空版的隨機布朗運動。

sentences.english: Brownian motion is simulated by using hard-ball systems.
sentences.chinese: 還利用少體硬球系統模擬布朗運動。

sentences.english: Fractional Brownian motion is a convenient model for this kind of process.
sentences.chinese: 分形布朗運動是模擬此類信號的很好的數學模型。

sentences.english: In this paper the probability distribution of super-Brownian motion for hitting single point is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了超布朗運動首中單點的概率分佈。
